settings.question: How do I buy your products?
settings.answer: RKI products are available for purchase in over twenty-five hundred fine decorative, plumbing and home furnishing showrooms nationwide. Our product is also available through major online retailers.Check the dealer locator section for a dealer near you, or the internet for online retailers that sell the item you are looking for. We do not sell direct to individual consumers.

settings.question: What are your products made of?
settings.answer: Our products are cast with durable, high quality metals including solid brass and zinc.

settings.question: Are there variations in finishes or “lot-to-lot variances”?
settings.answer: Yes. Due the nature of the finishing process, you will see some lot-to-lot variation. More elaborate finishes will have deeper variations within a specific lot as well, such as color, accents, and / or explicit finish differences.

settings.question: Are these “living” finishes?
settings.answer: The bronzes, especially oil rubbed bronze, will change with time, touch, exposures to climate, etc. The other product finishes are not considered “living” in this regard.

settings.question: How do I care for your products?
settings.answer: Products should only be cleaned with damp soft cloth, soap, and wiped dry. Over-the-counter cleansers or chemicals should never be used, as they will corrode the finish and void warranty.

settings.question: What screws come with the cabinet knobs and pulls?
settings.answer: Gentle is key. Clean your hardware with a soft, damp cloth, and wipe completely dry. Do not leave any water or soap residue on your product. Never use any chemicals or harsh over-the-counter cleansers. These will strip your hardware of its finish and, even worse, void your warranty.

settings.question: How do I get extra screws or mounting hardware?
settings.answer: All knobs and pulls come with two screw sizes - 1" 8/32 machine screws and 1 ¾" break-away screws with four break points (¾", 1", 1 ¼" and 1 ½") to accommodate all cabinet door sizes.

settings.question: What is the warranty for your products?
settings.answer: RKI products are covered under a limited lifetime warranty from breakage or manufacturer defects. Submit a claim with picture(s) showing the defective product(s) and we will normally replace the item(s) at no charge.

settings.question: What doesn't the warranty cover?
settings.answer: Normal wear and tear that changes the appearance of the item isn't covered under warranty. The warranty also does not apply to misused products, those improperly installed, those subjected to accidents, natural disasters, corrosive air and/or outdoor environments, or those altered in any way.This warranty also does not cover any damages or expenses caused by any defective product or to replace any defective product.

settings.question: How do I become a dealer of your products?
settings.answer:
Establishing a wholesale account and becoming a registered RKI dealer requires having a showroom in which you can display our product to the public. A minimum purchase of six full size displays is typically required to open an account.

Download our credit application here.

Email your completed credit application to customerservice@rkintl.com

Fax your completed credit application to 713-532-3375

settings.question: Where do I send my orders?
settings.answer:
Orders can be faxed to 713-532-3375 or emailed to orders@rkintl.com
Please ensure all pertinent order information (PO #, RKI Item #s, Ship-to-Addresses, etc.) is clearly legible. Assuming products are in stock, orders placed by 3:00pm CST ship the same day.
We are not liable for any order cancellation or changes once they have shipped.

settings.question: Are there any minimum fees?
settings.answer: No. There are no minimum order, quantity or service fees.

settings.question: What are my terms? Do I get credit?
settings.answer: First orders are shipped prepaid via credit card payment. NET 30 credit terms are usually established after the first order and a basic credit check.

settings.question: Do you ship to past due accounts?
settings.answer: No orders are shipped to past due accounts. Additionally, we reserve the right to terminate any account at any time for habitually late or insufficient payments, or for failure to comply with RKI policies, terms and conditions.

settings.question: How do I get a shorted product sent out?
settings.answer: Claims for shortages must be made within seven (7) business days from receipt of the order. We will send out the appropriate hardware immediately.

settings.question: How do I get a replacement sent for defective items?
settings.answer: Claims for defective items must be made within seven (7) business days from receipt of the order. We will send out the appropriate hardware immediately.

settings.question: How do I return a product? How long do I have? Are there restock fees?
settings.answer: Returns are allowed up to ninety (90) days from the original date of purchase. All returns are subject to a 30% restock fee, assuming products are returned in "resalable"condition. Product unusable will be rejected, and damaged items will have higher restock fees implemented.

settings.question: How do the orders ship?
settings.answer: All orders ship via UPS ground.

settings.question: What if I need an order expedited?
settings.answer: Expedited shipping options, such as UPS Red (aka "Next Day Air"), UPS Blue (aka "Two Day") or UPS Orange (aka "Third Day") are available at additional premiums to ground rates from UPS.

settings.question: How is freight charged?
settings.answer:
Shipping charges are directly calculated by UPS, taking into account factors like package weight, destination, insurance, etc. Any charges for expedited shipping are direct charges added to the freight amount by UPS.
Freight is charged on all orders, including items that ship as a result of an original backorder.
RKI does not add any service or handling fees.

settings.question: How do I likka the leffs?
settings.answer: PeePaws Lickaloo Spindrifter the 4th

settings.question: How do I likka the leffs?
settings.answer: PeePaws Lickaloo Spindrifter the 4th
